title: Browse surf classes on home and class listing pages
description: Verify that users can view all available surf classes on the home page and dedicated class listing pages with correct class details displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the home page
Check that a list of surf classes is visible with name, description, and thumbnail
Navigate to the class listing page
Validate surf classes are listed including filters and pagination (if any)
Click on a surf class to view class details
Confirm detailed class information is shown including sessions/date and participant limits

title: Multi-step booking flow for authenticated users
description: Ensure authenticated users can select a class session, add participant details, apply discount codes, and complete booking successfully.

steps.description: Login as a registered user with valid credentials
Select a surf class and open the booking modal
Choose a session date and time
Enter participant information and confirm details
Apply valid discount code and verify discount application
Submit booking request
Check booking confirmation page with reservation details
Verify reservation appears in user's reservations page

title: Guest checkout creates user account and sends welcome email
description: Verify that an unauthenticated user can complete booking via guest checkout, triggering automatic account creation with credentials emailed.

steps.description: Navigate to surf class booking modal as guest (not logged in)
Proceed through multi-step booking entering participant details and email
Submit guest booking
Check response for successful reservation and newly created user account token
Verify welcome email with login credentials is sent to the provided email
Attempt login with emailed credentials
User successfully logs in and reservations are accessible

title: Guest checkout fails on existing email with error
description: Confirm that guest checkout returns a proper error when attempting to book with an email that's already registered.

steps.description: Attempt guest booking using an email already associated with an existing user account
Check that API returns conflict or specific error code indicating email already exists
No duplicate user account is created

title: Reservation management: create, view, update, and cancel
description: Validate that authenticated users can create new reservations, view reservation details, update participant info, and cancel reservations properly.

steps.description: Login as authenticated user
Create a new reservation through booking flow
Verify reservation is visible in user's reservations list
Select an existing reservation to view details
Check reservation details match expected data including status and payment info
Update participant information within the reservation
Verify changes are saved and visible in reservation details
Cancel the reservation
Confirm reservation status is updated to cancelled and visible to user

title: Payment processing with voucher upload and admin verification
description: Ensure users can upload payment vouchers and admins can verify payment statuses with correct updates reflected in dashboards.

steps.description: Login as authenticated user and navigate to reservation payment section
Upload payment voucher image for a specific reservation
Confirm voucher upload success and voucher is linked to reservation
Login as school admin
View pending payments and verify the uploaded voucher
Mark payment as verified
Check payment status update is reflected in user's dashboard and reservation

title: Discount code application during booking
description: Verify discount codes can be applied during booking process, reflected in price calculation and successfully validated serverside.

steps.description: Start booking a surf class and navigate to discount code input
Enter a valid discount code and apply
Confirm discount percentage or value is applied to total price
Proceed to complete booking
Verify reservation price reflects discount and discount code is associated with payment record

title: Multi-tenant data isolation enforcement
description: Confirm that data shown to admins, instructors, and users is properly scoped only to their respective surf school tenancy without leakage.

steps.description: Login as admin of School A
View dashboard to list classes, reservations, users
Verify displayed data only belongs to School A
Attempt to access reservation or user data from School B via URL or API
Access is denied or data is not returned

title: Role-based dashboard access and controls
description: Validate that users accessing dashboards see role-specific views and controls based on their role: Student, Instructor, School Admin, Super Admin.

steps.description: Login as Student and navigate to dashboard
Confirm student sees only their reservations and profile info, cannot access admin controls
Login as Instructor
Confirm instructor sees class schedule, participant lists, and messaging with students
Login as School Admin
Confirm admin can manage classes, reservations, students, payments for their school only
Login as Super Admin
Confirm super admin can manage all schools, users and system-wide settings

title: Session persistence across booking navigation and login
description: Ensure booking state is preserved when users navigate away and return, or when switching from guest to logged-in during booking process.

steps.description: Begin booking as guest, select class, session, and enter partial participant info
Navigate away from booking modal to another page
Return to booking modal
Verify previously entered details are persisted and prefilled
Proceed to guest checkout and then choose to login instead
Login with existing or new account
Booking data is preserved post-login enabling completion without data loss

title: Automated email notifications for user events
description: Verify that automated emails are triggered and delivered upon key events: account creation, reservation confirmation, cancellation, payment receipt, and reminders.

steps.description: Complete guest booking to trigger account welcome email
Check welcome email is received with correct login credentials
Make a reservation booking as authenticated user
Confirm reservation confirmation email is sent
Cancel a reservation
Verify cancellation email is sent
Upload payment voucher for reservation
Confirm payment receipt email is sent
Simulate reminder trigger time prior to class session
Email reminder for upcoming class is sent

title: In-app notification real-time updates and UI
description: Validate that in-app notifications appear in real-time for relevant events and can be marked read via notification center with status updates.

steps.description: Login as user with active reservations
Trigger an event such as reservation confirmation or payment receipt
Verify corresponding notification appears in the notification center UI in real-time
Mark notification as read from notification center
Confirm notification status updates and UI reflects read state

title: Admin can create, update, and soft delete classes and users
description: Ensure school admins have authorized access to create new classes, update existing classes and users, and soft delete (deactivate) records with proper restrictions.

steps.description: Login as school admin
Create a new surf class with valid details
Confirm class is added and visible in class listing
Update the class details (e.g. time, participant limit)
Verify updated class details reflected in UI
Soft delete a class
Confirm class is marked inactive but not fully deleted and not visible to users
Update user information within their school tenancy
Verify updates apply only within current school scope

title: Image upload to Cloudinary with local fallback
description: Validate image uploads succeed to Cloudinary; if cloud upload fails, the system stores images in local fallback storage without data loss.

steps.description: Upload an image for product or class via UI
Confirm image upload success and URL references Cloudinary storage
Simulate Cloudinary service being unavailable
Attempt image upload again
Verify image is saved to local storage and accessible via expected fallback URL

title: Payment voucher upload validation and error handling
description: Check that payment voucher uploads are validated for format, size limits, and that invalid uploads are rejected with appropriate errors.

steps.description: Attempt to upload a valid voucher image file within size limits
Confirm upload success
Attempt to upload invalid file types (e.g. text file) or oversized images
Verify upload is rejected with meaningful error message

title: Reservation creation rejects overbooking
description: Ensure that reservation creation APIs reject booking requests when class session participant limits are exceeded to prevent overbooking.

steps.description: Identify a class session with participant limit reached
Attempt to create a new reservation for this session
Verify API returns appropriate error preventing booking

title: Reservation cancellation updates availability and notifications
description: Validate that cancelling a reservation frees participant spots for a class session and triggers cancellation email and in-app notification.

steps.description: Login and cancel an existing reservation
Confirm reservation marked cancelled and class session participant count updated
Verify cancellation email and in-app notification are sent to user

title: Instructor can view and manage assigned classes and schedules
description: Check that instructors have access to their specific dashboard showing assigned classes and session schedules with options to manage participant lists.

steps.description: Login as instructor
Navigate to instructor dashboard
Verify visibility of assigned classes and future session schedules
Open class session participant list
Confirm participants are correctly listed and participant management functionality available

title: Yape/Plin payment integration and status reflection
description: Validate integration with Yape and Plin payment methods; ensure that payments made through these methods update reservation payment status correctly.

steps.description: Select Yape or Plin as payment method during reservation payment
Complete payment via chosen payment gateway simulation
Check payment status updated to ‘paid’ after confirmation
Verify payment records displayed correctly in admin dashboard

title: School admin cannot access other schools’ data
description: Confirm that school admins are restricted from accessing classes, reservations, users, or payments belonging to another tenant school.

steps.description: Login as school admin from School X
Attempt to access URLs or APIs related to School Y’s data
Verify access is denied or data is not visible
